person.persName: John C. Brodhead (Nelson County, KY, prov govt conv rep)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, resident. Pennsylvania native. Married Elizabeth Ann Pottinger Brodhead in Nelson County on January 22, 1857. Father of Nannie Brodhead, William Brodhead, and Addie E. Brodhead. Railroad engineer in Cattaraugus County, New York in 1850. Railroad engineer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Nelson County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
